attributes.action: Have all public examinations (GCSE and A-Levels) changed
attributes.additional_details:
This is the only right thing for the government to do in regards to our future given the current circumstances we face ourselves in. 
The future of millions have been ruined by the cancellation of the last 2 years exams and so it is vital this is not repeated for the third time.
However for these to actually still go ahead as planned it is only appropriate that modification is made to them to face the time out of school current year 10s and 12s face with remote learning and to make it fairer
attributes.background:
This petition is to urge the government to not let the young people of this country down again and do the right thing by modifying next years public examinations to make it appropriate to still do so

- Specifying content in exams
- Lowering grade boundaries 
- Allowing additional notes in exams

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
